channel.title: Advanced in VB,Perl,C++.. Scriptable Macro Project?
channel.description:
Anyone up for a project preferably in VB since it's fast?
Project:
Color Macro
Option 1.) Made for rs, in other words contains procedures like dropslot(slotNum as int); specificly designed for runescape that make autoing easier.
Options 2.) Designed for all games and all purposes.
Need advanced programmers who at least can make this or [b]something much simpler[/b] on thier own. [i]It's really hard to state the level you have to be, usually you are better in a language then you belive you are[/i]
Make it simpler to script then PASCAL and at the same time have it accomplish complex tasks efficiently.
Be able to have users add thier own syntax ie, include exe, dll (binary files) like in SCAR :o
I can basicly make it myself but it takes too long and I don't want to.
I'd rather have my own interperter rather then using MSScript control.
And finally I fully will dedicate myself to this project and work on it day and night ;)

item.title: Advanced in VB,Perl,C++.. Scriptable Macro Project?
item.dc:creator: @Sean Sean
item.description:
@Sean wrote:

it can be done in theory, I just want no part of any colour clickers - I dont like them.

Read full topic
